title: DKNY Gigi Leather Zip Around Wallet
description: Get the latest from DKNY women’s clothing. Whether you’re pulling together a casual or sophisticated look, you’ll love the style choices from this always on-trend brand. From pants and tops to dresses and skirts, DKNY has the perfect piece to suit your fashion sense. In search of a great Pair Of Go-To Jeans? Check out skinny or boot cut styles from the collection. With features like five-pocket styling, belt loops and button and zipper closure, you’re sure to love pairing DKNY jeans with All Your Favorite Tops and jackets. Putting together a workweek ensemble? Get the perfect dress to showcase your professional style. Whether you prefer a simple sheath or a ponte-knit dress, you’ll find an incredible addition to your closet. Looking For A Dress you can wear when the temperature cools down? Also browse comfy, yet chic sweaterdresses to fit the bill. Need a layering or cold-weather jacket? Browse blazers, moto jackets and more to play up an incredible outfit. Put a fashionable spin on a pair of jeans with blazers featuring details like a shawl collar, front hook closure and welt pockets at the waist. Combine with the blouse or top of your choice for instant polish. Dress for success in complete outfits from DKNY. Cultivate the Perfect Look In Blazer and pant combinations or sweater and leggings pairings. You’ll even find coordinating jackets and skirts. No matter what the season, you’ll uncover the ideal outfit to show off your style.
